DOC.brief_summary: This study Proof Mechanism ( POM ) study establish evidence central pharmacodynamic activity PF 04455242 , parallel group , randomize , double blind , sponsor open study conduct healthy male subject . Once subject achieve steady state PF 04455242 , undergo PF 00345768 ( spiradoline ) challenge . Data analyze determine whether PF-04455242 block spiradoline induce prolactin release .
DOC.brief_title: Proof Of Mechanism Study To Determine Efficacy Of PF-04455242 In Blocking Spiradoline ( PF-00345768 ) Stimulated Prolactin Release
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 21 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12 lead ECG clinical laboratory test . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) .
